S.FORM: Yalisetute 亞里斯多德 kakiliman Yalisetute pakayni i nu uli a nananaman mitesek a palekal tu tebanay nu aiki a sapaikingkiw a sapidatemg, u nipicalilaw mulalad katukuh i malekalay tu a unyi hananay, sadikuday maala ni niwtun. pakayni i aadupan tu sapinanam sa, ya sapaculi nida i 19 nu siki anu palutatenga malucek sa, ya nikingkiwan ni nanaman pasu nuayawan a nidateng a nikinhkiwan, sadikuday nikingkiwan 19 a siki pulungen katukuh ayda ku sapadateng tu nikingkiwan. u sapi nanam sa, ci yalisetute a nutangah an nida a dateng i yiselan a milihayay atu yutay a milihayay mu duduc tu kakawsan idawtu ku macalaliaway mitedek tu, iteban nu siki, u kamu nida mududuc tu nu kilisetu a sapisinziya, widasa nu tinsukiw a kiwkay idaw ku mahiniay sapinanaman nu kakawsan. u sasakamun nida sa , kanahatu nulingatu katukuh tu macalalaway tu micedekay, nadikudan sa mukilul tu aydaay nu bangcalay a sasakamun makaala tu baluhay. ayda ci yalitute a nikingkiwan maudip tu i kakungkiwan tu nu cuwacuwaay. pakayni i sinilacul, ci yalisetute pakayni i kawaw misuwanis tu piadih a micalilaw tu mududuc tutebanay a siki atu patucek tu malukay, katukuh maadih ni yatangsemi a numukasiay u sapilacul nu sapananam. kanahatu ci yalisetute misulit tu yadahay a sasulitan tu dihemayay a sasakamuen "sisaylu sakamusa tu nisulitan nida tu wayway "ekima balad" sa" nika katuuday sakamu say a nisangaan nida tu sulit malaliyas tu sa, wida satu tuluay nu cacay sa kiya nitadasan nida amisulit mapaliwanay tu ayda masingatu. pulung nu mihcaan 342 amihcaan, Yalisetute mala wawa nu hunti ni Yalisanta asaydan. Yalisetute macitun a sakakaay ci huylipbu sakatusa muawaw taluma', namakayni i naayaway nu sila idaw kiya singangnnay a misulitay tu cuda ci pulutakek idaw ku nitengedan nida misulit, yalisetute pasayni tuamalasakakaay a kasenenga a tademaw pasubana' a hicaen ku katineng pasubana', u mamikuwan tu sitangahay atu sapalangaw. Yalisetute micukaymas cinida tu sapicalilaw tu udip, pasada ku nidateng cu yalisantaan kyu mapacekil tu baeketay nuheni a kawaw. Winisa tatenga macalilaw ni yalisetute, ci yalisata mapatay tu sapikingkiw tu tu kawaw atu miading tu tademaw , pakay ni tademawan kasenengan, pasuyda u hunti paini tu kibetulay a tademaw u kalisiw sapiedap, kyu ci yalisetute maedem ku nikingkiwan nida tu nananaman. nika, yalisetute aci yalisanta nu sapikuwa nikasasuadih nu heni caay kalecad kanahatu cay kasasulecad. Nuayawan asapikuwan pakayni i sapisaluma' nika amalawpes t uku sila a nipatektek sa, ci yalisan ta huti amupatideng cinida tu tanul nu sakay sila a binacadan u hengad hakiya u taluayaw tu pipatideng kya. .

Yalisetote 亞里斯多德 kakiliman Yalisetote pakayni i no oli a nananaman mitesek a palekal to tebanay no aiki a sapaikingkiw a sapidatemg, o nipicalilaw molalad katokoh i malekalay to a onyi hananay, sadikoday maala ni niwton. pakayni i aadopan to sapinanam sa, ya sapacoli nida i 19 no siki ano palotatenga malocek sa, ya nikingkiwan ni nanaman paso noayawan a nidateng a nikinhkiwan, sadikoday nikingkiwan 19 a siki polongen katokoh ayda ko sapadateng to nikingkiwan. o sapi nanam sa, ci yalisetote a notangah an nida a dateng i yiselan a milihayay ato yotay a milihayay mo dodoc to kakawsan idawto ko macalaliaway mitedek to, iteban no siki, o kamo nida mododoc to no kiliseto a sapisinziya, widasa no tinsokiw a kiwkay idaw ko mahiniay sapinanaman no kakawsan. o sasakamon nida sa , kanahato nolingato katokoh to macalalaway to micedekay, nadikodan sa mokilol to aydaay no bangcalay a sasakamon makaala to balohay. ayda ci yalitote a nikingkiwan maodip to i kakongkiwan to no cowacowaay. pakayni i sinilacol, ci yalisetote pakayni i kawaw misowanis to piadih a micalilaw to mododoc totebanay a siki ato patocek to malokay, katokoh maadih ni yatangsemi a nomokasiay o sapilacol no sapananam. kanahato ci yalisetote misolit to yadahay a sasolitan to dihemayay a sasakamoen "sisaylo sakamosa to nisolitan nida to wayway "ekima balad" sa" nika katooday sakamo say a nisangaan nida to solit malaliyas to sa, wida sato toloay no cacay sa kiya nitadasan nida amisolit mapaliwanay to ayda masingato. polong no mihcaan 342 amihcaan, Yalisetote mala wawa no honti ni Yalisanta asaydan. Yalisetote maciton a sakakaay ci hoylipbo sakatosa moawaw taloma', namakayni i naayaway no sila idaw kiya singangnnay a misolitay to coda ci polotakek idaw ko nitengedan nida misolit, yalisetote pasayni toamalasakakaay a kasenenga a tademaw pasobana' a hicaen ko katineng pasobana', o mamikowan to sitangahay ato sapalangaw. Yalisetote micokaymas cinida to sapicalilaw to odip, pasada ko nidateng co yalisantaan kyo mapacekil to baeketay noheni a kawaw. Winisa tatenga macalilaw ni yalisetote, ci yalisata mapatay to sapikingkiw to to kawaw ato miading to tademaw , pakay ni tademawan kasenengan, pasoyda o honti paini to kibetolay a tademaw o kalisiw sapiedap, kyo ci yalisetote maedem ko nikingkiwan nida to nananaman. nika, yalisetote aci yalisanta no sapikowa nikasasoadih no heni caay kalecad kanahato cay kasasolecad. Noayawan asapikowan pakayni i sapisaloma' nika amalawpes t oko sila a nipatektek sa, ci yalisan ta hoti amopatideng cinida to tanol no sakay sila a binacadan o hengad hakiya o taloayaw to pipatideng kya. .
